brainly_data.question: An increase in which of the following will decrease the monthly payment? A. Interest rate B. Number of months financed C. Principal D. None of the above
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics

all_answers.question: An increase in which of the following will decrease the monthly payment? A. Interest rate B. Number of months financed C. Principal D. None of the above
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text:
An increase in the number of months that you will pay will decrease the payment because you will divide the total amount owed between a larger number which would result in a smaller amount each month.

Ex:  $1000 paid in 5 months is $200/month.
      $1000 paid in 10 months is $100/month.
